adjective.description: Of or relating to a centaur or centaurs; characteristic or reminiscent of a centaur.
Chiefly Science Fiction. With capital initial. Of or relating to the constellation Centaurus or one of its star systems, especially Alpha Centauri, or its (imagined) inhabitants.

noun.description: With capital initial. An (imagined) inhabitant of the constellation Centaurus or of a star system within it, especially Alpha Centauri.

origin: Mid 17th century; earliest use found in Edward Waterhouse.
